description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8fgsd","text":"This is the protocol for the preparation of NLDM medium as described in de Raad et al., 2022 - A Defined Medium for Cultivation and Exometabolite Profiling of Soil Bacteria. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":75,"length":97}],"data":{}},{"key":"5mdju","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dgse0","text":"The Northen Lab Defined Medium (NLDM) is a defined medium and thus suited for exometabolomic experiments. It is  based on the metabolite composition of R2A and soil, metabolite usage by microbes, and biologically relevant elemental stoichiometry of these compounds. NLDM supports the growth of a wide range of phylogenetically diverse soil bacterial isolates and all of its metabolites are trackable through LC–MS/MS analysis. This demonstrate the viability and utility of the constructed NLDM medium for growing and characterizing diverse microbial isolates and communities. We anticipate that the NLDM medium will enable the examination of microbial substrate utilization for a broad range of isolates both directly and through dilution and amendments. We speculate that this media may have additional value in supporting microbial isolations and additional types of microbial characterization.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"brnmk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"epd6j","text":"Please cite NLDM as follows: de Raad M, Li YV, Kuehl JV, Andeer PF, Kosina SM, Hendrickson A, Saichek NR, Golini AN, Han LZ, Wang Y, Bowen BP, Deutschbauer AM, Arkin AP, Chakraborty R and Northen TR (2022) A Defined Medium for Cultivation and Exometabolite Profiling of Soil Bacteria. Front. Microbiol. 13:855331. DOI:10.3389/fmicb.2022.855331","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B563FB30F96E11EC98DCD1D958FC838D","url":"https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fmicb.2022.855331/full"}}}}

keywords: Defined medium, defined media,  exometabolomics, liquid chromatography mass spectrometry, soil bacteria, R2A

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

{"blocks":[{"key":"cgab1","text":"Adjust the pH of the NLDM medium 7.0 - 7.2 if needed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"37f6b","text":"Filter sterilize the NLDM medium using a 0.22 um filter","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"apcef","text":"Store the NLDM medium at 4ºC in the dark","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
